rules_text:
Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
When Trapjaw Kraken enters, tap it and up to one other target creature.
notes:
Changed name (to match art), added art, added flavor text
+ Beast type — to give blue a beast just-in-case for gruul synergy
Serpent —> Kraken (to match art)
